title: In what fucking world is Zed balanced?
body:
I'm done with Zedmains jerking their champ, claiming that he isn't that good, when in reality he is broken like fucking hell

A champ with no manacosts that completely oneshots enemies without even needing to ult.

I'm so fucking done with this game at this point. This balanceteam is a fucking joke.

Hey I'm an adc main

It's kinda obvious that I dont like Zed, but neither I think that he's op.

I mean, its all about maining the right marksmen when dealing with zed.

I can play tristana and just laugh my ass off as he tries to do anything at all no problem.

Or kai sa/lucian if i feel like making a sport of it.

Or Xayah to just ensure he will never get a single ult on you.

Or you can main Ashe, kog, MF or Jinx and just get the daylights wrecked......some matchups play out better than others and thats about it.

Even Ashe does decent while she's grouped she can stall for her team to react by simply ulting him the second he comes out of his own ult. At that point he gets hit by whatever your support has and he just dies right then and there while CC chained.

Ashe in my experience isnt a good pick into zed, the reason being that if his burst is just too high, especially with ignite.

If you dont have a support like lulu or someone who manages to react perfectly and instantly stun him the moment he goes anywhere near you then its a bad deal.

R-E-AA-ignite actually kills you even with tabi post some point, if he hits the Q´s then he does it with no issue at all which makes the lack of mobility very depressing.

Pretty sure the exact state of Zed is that he is broken in terms of when his power is.

Early he is a fucking obnoxiously unfair douche-canoe that procs two items worth of free damage off of an ult, drops a 300 damage summoner spell on you, and then spams laugh afterwards, while late-game he sucks donkey chode as everyone and their mother has GA and Zhonya's and the tanks just giggle at his attempts to do much of anything.

I have asked multiple times to stop this "LolgottawinearlyorI'mworthlessasdogshit" balancing nonsense with Zed, but Rito doesn't care. Just pumped more power into his early and hoped that balanced out his win-rates versus putting in effort to make the champion itself more balanced.

W->Q->E->auto
OR
W->E->Q->auto

Q: 80 / 115 / 150 / 185 / 220 (+ 90% bonus AD)
E: 70 / 95 / 120 / 145 / 170 (+ 80% bonus AD)
Auto: 100% AD + passive dmg if below 50%

To be honest I would be fine with Zed, if it wasn't for his current Ult.

His ultimate ability might be one of the strongest in the game. Him being able to store 55% of the damage that he deals from practically all sources is rediculous. And anyone who can't buy an item like Zhonya's Hourglass get's punished, because it's undodgeble due to being a point to click ability. And even then if you manage to bypass his R you're basically a sitting duck for him to W + E + Q + Ignite + Electrocute.

Zed's R is badly designed because he punishes basically almost everyone and himself once they have ways of bypassing his R.
You dont need an early hourglass, just buy an armguard and you deny him every lethality dmg set he has. Unless you're like 40% hp when he ults you, at which point that was your own fault.
